aboutMe.name: Ibrahim Klusmann
aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am a software developer specializing in frontend with a passion for problem solving and implementing new technologies.
aboutMe.passion: s. I enjoy transforming complex challenges into simple, user friendly websites and apps while delivering elegant solutions through clean, efficient code.
aboutMe.hobbies: When not coding, i like to dance salsa and bachata, photography, cooking and lift weights. These activities help me stay creative and energized.

description.frontend: Developing new features and maintaining a responsive portal using modern frontend technologies, testing, maintaining and refactoring existing codes.
description.vb: Developing functional and user friendly interface as a replacement for the excel sheets.
description.support: Professional customer consultations, managing customer inquiries, offering professional advice, addressing complaints, and resolving technical issues
description.student: Studied and graduated from the University of osnabrueck with a Bachelor of Science in computer science.
description.mentor: Mentoring students in the field of web development and providing guidance on best practices, sessions planning, tickets creation and project management.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: A modern and responsive portfolio developed with React and TypeScript that showcases my professionalism and technical skills.
portfolio.problem: Creating a platform that professionally and engagingly showcases my technical skills, projects, and personality was a challenge. The website needed to stand out visually while also excelling technically with interactivity, internationalization, and user friendliness.
portfolio.solution: To address this challenge, I developed a portfolio using React and TypeScript. It features modern animations, interactive elements, and supports internationalization through i18n. Additionally, I integrated a dark and light mode to allow users to choose their preferred theme. The overall user experience was optimized to make navigation intuitive and engaging.

FlexJourney.title: FlexJourney
FlexJourney.description: A modern, responsive fitness tracking website developed using React and TypeScript to help users track their fitness goals.
FlexJourney.problem: Many fitness tracking apps are either paid or loaded with intrusive ads, which detract from the user experience. This motivated me to create my own solution. FlexJourney is a fitness tracking app designed to help users monitor their progress while providing a seamless and user friendly experience.
FlexJourney.solution: FlexJourney allows users to create personalized workout plans or choose from a curated list of pre made plans. With an intuitive interface, the app makes it easy to track progress and ensures a high quality user experience.

qrbites.title: QRBites
qrbites.description: A modern digital menu management system for restaurants, enabling contactless dining experiences through QR code technology.
qrbites.problem: Traditional paper menus in restaurants present multiple challenges: they're unhygienic (especially post-pandemic), difficult to update with price changes or new items, costly to reprint, and don't provide analytics on customer preferences. Additionally, managing multiple restaurant locations with different menus creates operational complexity, and paper menus can't accommodate real-time updates for out-of-stock items or special offers.
qrbites.solution: QRBites solves these challenges by providing a comprehensive digital menu platform. Restaurant owners can create and manage multiple restaurants and menus through an intuitive dashboard, instantly update prices and availability, and generate unique QR codes for each menu. Customers simply scan the QR code to access a beautifully designed, mobile-optimized menu without downloading any app.

techlabs.title: TechLabs
techlabs.description: A modern, responsive IT Bootcamp website developed using React and TypeScript to help people get into the tech industry for free.
techlabs.problem: current Techlabs website is outdated and doesn't provide enough information about the available IT Bootcamps and call to action to get people into the tech industry. This motivated me to create my own solution.
techlabs.solution: TechLabs gives you a complete overview of our IT bootcamps and a clear call to action to launch your tech career. Real alumni stories, upcoming and past events, and company partnerships for internships and jobs round out the experience—delivered with seamless usability and excellent accessibility.
